configuration.title: Clock
configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.title: Instruction
configuration.name: Executed
configuration.description: Instruction architecturally executed

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: Instruction refill
configuration.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

configuration.title: Clock
configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.title: Instruction
configuration.name: Executed
configuration.description: Instruction architecturally executed

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: L2 miss
configuration.description: Any cacheable miss in the L2 cache

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: L1 miss
configuration.description: Any accesses to the L2 cache

configuration.title: Branch
configuration.name: Mispredicted
configuration.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

configuration.title: Clock
configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.title: Instruction
configuration.name: Executed
configuration.description: Counts the number of instructions going through the Register Renaming stage. This number is an approximate number of the total number of instructions speculatively executed, and even more approximate of the total number of instructions architecturally executed

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: Coherency miss
configuration.description: Counts the number of coherent linefill requests performed by the Cortex-A9 processor which also miss in all the other Cortex-A9 processors, meaning that the request is sent to the external memory

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: Coherency hit
configuration.description: Counts the number of coherent linefill requests performed by the Cortex-A9 processor which hit in another Cortex-A9 processor, meaning that the linefill data is fetched directly from the relevant Cortex-A9 cache

configuration.title: Branch
configuration.name: PC change
configuration.description: Software change of Program Counter, except by an exception, architecturally executed

configuration.title: Branch
configuration.name: Mispredicted
configuration.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

configuration.title: Fault
configuration.name: Unaligned access
configuration.description: Unaligned access architecturally executed

configuration.title: Clock
configuration.name: Cycles
configuration.description: The number of core clock cycles

configuration.title: Instruction
configuration.name: Executed
configuration.description: Instruction architecturally executed

configuration.title: Cache
configuration.name: L2 data access
configuration.description: Level 2 data cache access

configuration.title: Branch
configuration.name: Mispredicted
configuration.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

configuration.title: Interrupts
configuration.name: IRQ
configuration.description: Linux IRQ taken

configuration.title: Interrupts
configuration.name: SoftIRQ
configuration.description: Linux SoftIRQ taken

configuration.title: Disk IO
configuration.name: Write
configuration.description: Disk IO Bytes Written

configuration.title: Disk IO
configuration.name: Read
configuration.description: Disk IO Bytes Read

configuration.title: Memory
configuration.name: Used
configuration.description: Total used memory size

configuration.title: Memory
configuration.name: Free
configuration.description: Available memory size

configuration.title: Network
configuration.name: Receive
configuration.description: Receive network traffic, excluding effect from Streamline

configuration.title: Network
configuration.name: Transmit
configuration.description: Transmit network traffic, excluding effect from Streamline

configuration.title: CPU Load
configuration.name: System
configuration.description: Scheduler CPU Load of System Behavior

configuration.title: CPU Load
configuration.name: User
configuration.description: Scheduler CPU Load of User Application
